message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a limited time at the special price of $150. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can only justify spending up to $100 for it. Would you consider meeting me halfway?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $150 is already a very competitive price for this product.  Would you be willing to meet me at $130?
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position, but I am still not able to go above $100 for this product. Could we perhaps meet at $120?
